task.name: importfitsidi
task.shortdescription: Convert a FITS-IDI file to a CASA visibility data set
task.description: Convert a FITS-IDI file to a CASA visiblity data set.
task.example:
If several files are given, they will be concatenated into one MS.
Keyword arguments: fitsidifile -- Name(s) of input FITS-IDI file(s) default: none; must be supplied example='3C273XC1.IDI' example=['3C273XC1.IDI1','3C273XC1.IDI2'] vis -- Name of output visibility file (MS) default: none; example: vis='3C273XC1.ms' async -- Run asynchronously default = false; do not run asychronously
